## SenderResource.deleteDefaultSignature() method

Deletes the image that is being used by a recipient as their default signature when signing a transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteDefaultSignature(senderId: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  senderId | string | Unique sender ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
